title: Ep. 93 - Rick Rule Unplugged
itunes:title: Rick Rule Unplugged
description: Legendary resource investor Rick Rule talks about where gold and silver prices are headed. He also discusses his favorite areas to invest, huge opportunities in natural gas, and his favorite alternative energy investment.
